generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- building: There are large buildings visible on both sides of the road, including a modern white building and an older stone building.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible along the sides of the road and in front of the buildings.
- person: A person is visible standing near the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a white taxi on the right and multiple other vehicles in the lanes.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole near the intersection.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and signs.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk and between the trees.
